StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIQualifySSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN char(9), @Valid char(1) OUTPUT, @NWAID int OUTPUT, @PersonID int OUTPUT AS
--- IS THIS A VALID SSN (IS THERE A CORRESPONDING MARINE CANDIDATE AND NWA RECORD) SET @Valid = CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PERSON P INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON (P.PERSON_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN) INNER JOIN NWA N ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END
--- IF THE SSN IS VALID, GET THE PERSON ID AND NWA ID IF @Valid = 'Y' BEGIN --- GET THE PersonID SELECT @PersonID = P.PERSON_ID FROM PERSON P WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN
--- GET THE NWAID SET @NWAID = dbo.GetMaxNWAID(@PersonID) END
